          <title>
            <string language="et">Kes elab metsa sees</string>
            <string language="en">Who is living in the forest?</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wer lebt im Wald?</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Qui vit dans la forêt ?</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Quem está vivendo na floresta?</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Chi sta vivendo nella foresta?</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ποιος ζει στο δάσος;</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">¿Quién está viviendo en el bosque?</string>
          </title>
          <language>et</language>
          <description>
            <string language="et">Õppematerjal koosneb PowerPoint esitlusest ja tunnikavast ning tutvustab metsloomi.</string>
            <string language="en">Study material comprises a PowerPoint presentation and lesson plan and introduces wild animals.</string>

            <string language="x-mt-de">Studie Material enthält eine PowerPoint Darstellung und

          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Le matériel d'étude comporte une présentation de

          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">O material do estudo compreende uma apresentação de

          </description>

            <string language="x-mt-it">Il materiale di studio contiene una presentazione del

          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Το υλικό μελέτης περιλαμβάνει ένα σχέδιο παρουσίασης
PowerPoint και μαθήματος και εισάγει τα άγρια ζώα.</string>
          </description>
